hero.title: Hi, I'm Babak Gasimzade, a Junior Mobile and Frontend Developer

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a highly skilled Frontend and Mobile Application Developer with a strong command of React, React Native, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. I specialize in designing and developing performant, scalable, and visually refined web and mobile solutions. With a keen eye for detail and a user-centered mindset, I consistently deliver seamless digital experiences tailored to modern standards.
